Header: Exams department prepares for AL exams starting tomorrow
Content: The Department of Examinations says that all preparations have been made for the GCE Advanced Level examinations. Commissioner General of Examinations W.M.N.J. Pushpakumara says that the examinations will take place from Aug. 2 to Aug. 27 in 2,204 exam centres. The commissioner general also made clear the procedures to be followed during the examinations.Â He stated that as examinations commence at 8.30 a.m., all applicants must be present at their respective examination centres before 8 a.m.
